Params: {2: 'Tom', 3: 'You—you plan to distract all those monsters by yourself?'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'You two, scram! Or else— Ugh! Just scram!'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "But I also won't leave you here."}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I don't care what those damned Corrupted think they are. I'll show them what the Queen of the streets can do!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Search Party', 3: "It's no use, the professor's already...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher', 3: 'The scientist who was once the pioneer of Construct Tech, my mentor.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: "Disappeared one day due to the overwhelming stress... Who would've thought, in a place like this...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Search Party', 3: "Wait! There's still signs of life here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: 'If we can use the professor\'s technology to "save" this child...', 4: '1'}
